text: Carlo Fonseka ( Kālō Fonsēkā; 4 March 1933 - 2 September 2019) was a Sri Lankan physician, academic and political activist. He was a dean of the Faculty of Medicine, University of Kelaniya. He was president of the Sri Lanka Medical Council from 2012 through 2017. He was born in Colombo, Ceylon. Fonseka died in Colombo on 2 September 2019 at the age of 86.Professor Carlo Fonseka passed away ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Sri Lankan academics Category:Sri Lankan politicians Category:Physicians Category:People from Colombo
title: Carlo Fonseka
